How can I increase the number of connections in my Verus node to help the network and broadcast my stakes more quickly?

You can increase the number of connections in your Verus node by adding the line "maxconnections=n" to your VRSC.conf file, where n is the number of connections you want to use. This will allow your node to broadcast your stakes more quickly and help the network.
